snippet.title: Tea for Sana - Official Demo Trailer | WLG Showcase 2025
snippet.description: Tea for Sana is a story-driven exploration game set in the mountains of a Slavic-inspired fantasy world. Discover recipes, forage for ingredients, and cook traditional dishes to restore the balance between the mountain spirits and the villagers below. Tea for Sana will be available on PC. A demo is out now on Steam.
